testcase.name: Avoiding clicking the Green Button twice
testcase.system-out: Given that I open the browser with the url "http://www.uitestingplayground.com/home".passed When we press the option "Hidden Layers"....................................passed And we click the Hidden Layers button.......................................passed And we click the Hidden Layers button.......................................passed Then we confirm if the green button wasn't pressed twice....................passed

testcase.name: Waiting for the Load Delay to find desired button
